name: preview-build
instructions:
Serves the production build from the dist/ directory for testing before deployment.

Prerequisites:
- Production build must exist (run 'npm run build' first)

The preview server:
- Runs at http://localhost:4173
- Serves optimized production files
- Simulates production environment
- Does NOT include hot reload (unlike dev server)

Use this to:
- Test production build performance
- Verify bundle optimization
- Check for production-only bugs
- Validate asset loading

Press Ctrl+C to stop the server.
